metadata.title: CVE-2017-0669 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description: A information disclosure vulnerability in the Android framework. Product:Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-34114752.

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
android-framework-23 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
